name: Arthur Gervais
content: Arthur Gervais - Professor of Information Security @ UCL | AI for Security Research riddle.exe Daily Challenge I speak in zeros and ones, yet I understand human lies. I learn from patterns hidden, yet I see through disguise. In networks I wander, seeking threats that hide in plain sight. What am I? solution$ Execute research.log Research Areas Our working areas include but are not limited to: AI for Security Developing AI systems that can detect and prevent cyber threats in real-time Blockchains Analyzing smart contracts for vulnerabilities and blockchain security mechanisms Decentralized Finance Understanding DeFi protocols, their security implications, and automated analysis Publications → Google Scholar teaching.course Teaching Blockchain Course Comprehensive blockchain technology course covering fundamentals, security, and applications. Watch on YouTube → DeFi Course Deep dive into Decentralized Finance protocols, mechanisms, and security considerations. Course Website → YouTube Playlist → Academic Paper Writing Guide to writing high-quality academic papers in computer science and security research. Writing Tutorial → phd_application.md PhD?
